visited.review: An amazing collection of historical artifacts. A must-visit for history buffs!
Quirky and fun, a unique spot.
Classic sandwiches and chill vibes. Perfect for a quick, budget-friendly bite.
The best place to read a book and sip on amazing chai. So cozy.
The hike was challenging but the views are breathtaking. Perfect for photos at sunrise.
Highest point in Pune, great for a morning walk and city views.
It's more of a park than a real hike. Good for a walk but not very adventurous.
Loved the vibe and the food is delicious. Their cakes are famous for a reason!
The best SPDP in town. An absolute Pune classic, always worth the wait.
Huge mall with all the brands you need. Great food court too.
Was expecting more, it's mostly just ruins. Not worth the entry fee.
A serene and historically significant place. The architecture is beautiful for photos.
Incredible rock-cut temple right in the city. A hidden gem.
The best Misal Pav in Pune, period. It's spicy and absolutely delicious.
The heart of city shopping for traditional wear and household items. Very crowded but great for deals.
Best place for live music and a fun night out with friends.
An iconic Irani cafe. Their bun maska and chai are legendary. Very budget-friendly.
A beautiful and peaceful Japanese garden. Perfect for a quiet afternoon.
A lovely little cafe combined with a library. Great concept for book lovers.
Industrial decor and amazing fusion food. The cocktails are top-notch.
Classic Social experience. Great for working during the day and partying at night.
An absolute Pune institution. Their Shrewsbury biscuits are world-famous for a reason.
Good collection of brands and a nice cinema. Can get crowded.
You cannot leave Pune without trying their Bhakarwadi. Simply the best.
Great place for live gigs, especially electronic music. The sound system is fantastic.
A wonderful, intimate space for poetry readings and art exhibitions.
A challenging but incredibly rewarding trek. The history of this place is palpable.
Beautiful spot for a long drive, especially during the monsoon. Boating is available.
Incredibly serene and beautiful. A perfect place to meditate or just sit and read.
A large garden, but not very well maintained. Good for a walk but could be better.
A very well-maintained museum dedicated to our armed forces. Very informative.
A beautiful historical structure, but it's not well preserved and is mostly occupied by offices.
The ultimate street shopping destination in Pune. You need to bargain hard!
Authentic and delicious Maharashtrian thali. The food is outstanding.
A popular hangout spot for locals. Great for enjoying corn on the cob by the water.
Another name for the Pune-Okayama Friendship Garden. It's stunning for photography.
A unique 3D holographic museum. A very different and moving experience.
Lush green lanes, perfect for a peaceful walk. Lots of nice cafes and boutiques.
A beautiful memorial with stunning architecture. A quiet and underrated historical spot.
Another Pune institution. Famous for its biryani and non-veg dishes.
The go-to place for any student. You can find almost any academic book here.
A must-visit for its old-school charm and delicious food. The kheema is amazing.
Nice for bird watching, but the lake itself is not very clean. Good for a quick photo stop.
A fun water park, great for a day trip with friends or family.
The Sunday brunch here is an experience in luxury. Impeccable service and food.
A good mall with a nice selection of stores and a cinema.
